author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 42-year-old man was arrested on Saturday night for sexually abusing his three-year old daughter. His wife, a domestic worker, filed a complaint with the Child Welfare Committee (CWC) and a case has been registered at police station.

A resident of Vaithikuppam, the unemployed father of this three-year old spends most of his time at home.

His wife comes home after finishing domestic work in four to five houses everyday. On Saturday, she came back home by 3 p.m. and was shocked to witness her husband sexually abusing their daughter. She immediately rescued the child and took her to the Rajiv Gandhi Government Women and Child Hospital.

An official at the CWC stated that the child seems visibly disturbed. “She is slowly recovering. A case has been filed against the father under Section 10 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act (POCSO).

Since 2013, nearly 59 cases of child abuse have been reported in Puducherry.

On March 4, a 14-year old boy was reported to have been sexually abused by a woman home warden at a privateChildren’s Home in Kirumampakkam for almost a year.
title: Man arrested for sexually abusing 3-year-old daughter
